Name: Unique Wedding and Events
About: Unique Weddings and Events was created from my passion of delivering beautiful weddings and events. I am British and have lived in Koh Samui, Thailand for 8 years. I provide bespoke tailor made event planning for all sizes and budgets of weddings.  I manage your budget and take all the stress from a destination wedding away from you.  I was also married in Mauritius in a destination wedding so i completely understand how all my brides and grooms feel embarking on this magical journey.

About: Wedding Boutique is a Destination Wedding and Special Events Organization based in Phuket, and operating in other famous locations in Thailand. If you are looking for something Exclusive, Unconventional and Tailor-made you should contact Ilaire and let her make your Dream come true.
